mapper.insert: insert into t_cart( userId, dvdId, buynum, itemprice, status ) values(#{user.id}, #{dvd.id}, #{buynum}, #{itemprice}, #{status});
mapper.update: update t_cart set buynum=#{buynum}, itemprice=#{itemprice} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select c.id c_id, c.buynum, c.itemprice, c.status c_status, d.id d_id, d.name, d.status d_status, d.createDate, d.color, d.detail, d.price, d.imgIndex, l.id l_id, l.loginId from t_cart c inner join t_dvd d on c.dvdId=d.id inner join t_login l on c.userId=l.id where c.userId=#{userId} and c.dvdId=#{dvdId} and c.status=1;

select c.id c_id, c.buynum, c.itemprice, c.status c_status, d.id d_id, d.name, d.status d_status, d.createDate, d.color, d.detail, d.price, d.imgIndex, l.id l_id, l.loginId from t_cart c inner join t_dvd d on c.dvdId=d.id inner join t_login l on c.userId=l.id where c.userId=#{userId} and c.status=1;
